wikitext.*:
'''''Journey of the Dunadan''''' is the first studio album of the band [[Glass Hammer]]. It is a concept album based on the story of [[Aragorn]] from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''. The Album was released in 1993.
